document_data.name: Molvayas Barrison Del'Armgo
document_data.mainbody: '''Molvayas Barrison Del'Armgo''' was a [[drow]] priestess of [[Lolth]] in [[Menzoberranzan]] and a member of [[House Barrison Del'Armgo]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: During the [[Silence of Lolth]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, her niece [[Drisinil Barrison Del'Armgo]] started a coup against Matron Mistress [[Quenthel Baenre]], who in her eyes had lost Lolth's favor. Drisinil profited off the opportunity to kill Molvayas, saying to fellow conspirators that she had surely betrayed them to Quenthel.
